author: luganodes_arjun
content:
Hey guys I am trying to run a node on goerli testnet for providing an RPC endpoint for my axelar node. I have used the following documentation: https://docs.axelar.dev/validator/external-chains/ethereum and the official eth docs. I am stuck with the following error on the execution and consensus clients:

geth:
```
Jan 12 07:25:51 eth-testnet-node1 geth[3561]: WARN [01-12|07:25:51.228] Beacon client online, but never received consensus updates. Please ensure your beacon client is operational to follow the chain!
```

prysm:
```
[2023-01-12 07:54:16]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 62 starting from  0x53bc8bf9... 1152/4750171 - estimated time remaining 60h14m10s blocksPerSecond=21.9 peers=26
[2023-01-12 07:54:18]  INFO powchain: Ready for The Merge latestDifficulty=1 network=prater terminalDifficulty=10790000
[2023-01-12 07:54:19]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 62 starting from  0xa6972412... 1216/4750171 - estimated time remaining 60h5m53s blocksPerSecond=21.9 peers=26
[2023-01-12 07:54:22]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 62 starting from  0x46e6c7d3... 1280/4750171 - estimated time remaining 60h14m4s blocksPerSecond=21.9 peers=24
[2023-01-12 07:54:25]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 63 starting from  0xd7c1ab67... 1344/4750172 - estimated time remaining 60h22m17s blocksPerSecond=21.9 peers=25
[2023-01-12 07:54:28]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 60 starting from  0x9d648893... 1408/4750172 - estimated time remaining 60h30m33s blocksPerSecond=21.8 peers=24
```
